ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Provider View for Auditing
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: A view form for MIMED Provider records created for recording the views for auditing
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPDataForm.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create Procedure dbo.USR_USP_UMHS_PROVIDERS_VIEW ( @ID uniqueidentifier , --@UMHSID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier = null output , @PROVIDERNAME nvarchar(100) = null output, @PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(100) = null output, @DEPARTMENT nvarchar(100) = null output, @SUBDEPARTMENT nvarchar(100) = null output, @ADMITDOCTORIND bit = null output, @ATTENDDOCTORIND bit = null output, @RESIDENTDOCTORIND bit = null output, @CONSULTDOCTORIND bit = null output, @PHONE nvarchar(100) = null output, @DATALOADED BIT = 0 OUTPUT, --@MSG NVARCHAR(100) = NULL OUTPUT, --may need latter if they want to capture things in event viewer. @CURRENTAPPUSERID uniqueidentifier ) as
select DISTINCT p.ID, c.ID as CONSTITUENTID, c.NAME as PROVIDERNAME, p.PROVIDERDRNUMBER, case when d.ID is NOT null then d.NAME else N'' end as DEPARTMENT, case when sd.ID is NOT null then sd.NAME else N'' end as SUBDEPARTMENT, p.ADMITDOCTORIND, p.ATTENDDOCTORIND, p.RESIDENTDOCTORIND, p.CONSULTDOCTORIND, dbo.USR_UFN_UM_FORMATPHONE(p.PHONE) as PHONE
from dbo.USR_UMHS_PROVIDERS p inner join USR_UMHS_VISITS v on v.providerid = p.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = p.CONSTITUENTID left join USR_UMHS_DATA u on u.ID = v.UMHSID --left outer join [STATE] s on s.ID = p.STATEID left outer join USR_UMHS_DEPARTMENT d on d.ID = p.DEPARTMENTID left outer join USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT sd on sd.ID = p.SUBDEPARTMENTID WHERE v.UMHSID = @ID
/* --Audit code start */ DECLARE @USERNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @DISPLAYNAME VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @NAME VARCHAR(200) DECLARE @EVENTMESSAGE VARCHAR(1000) DECLARE @PID VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @PATIENTONLY BIT DECLARE @PATIENTSECURITY VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @USERNAME = USERNAME ,@DISPLAYNAME = DISPLAYNAME FROM APPUSER WHERE ID = @CURRENTAPPUSERID
SELECT @NAME = NAME ,@PID = LOOKUPID FROM CONSTITUENT inner join USR_UMHS_DATA gp on gp.CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENT.ID WHERE gp.ID = @ID DECLARE @CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER
IF @CHANGEAGENTID is null EXEC dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
Declare @PAGEID uniqueidentifier ='88159265-2b7e-4c7b-82a2-119d01ecd40f' --Constituent Page Declare @TABID uniqueidentifier ='d797ffd4-d395-4574-8028-448cced5c31b' --MIMED Data Declare @SUBTABID uniqueidentifier ='3f47b8c0-4552-4b85-a8ef-ed4cf8733b46' --MIMED Provider subtab
--Insert in to log table for auditing purpose. INSERT INTO dbo.USR_UMHS_MIMEDTABVIEWLOG(APPUSERID,PAGEID, TABID, SUBTABID, CONTEXTRECORDID, ISPATIENTVIEW, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID,DATEADDED, DATECHANGED ) VALUES ( @CURRENTAPPUSERID,@PAGEID,@TABID,@SUBTABID, @ID, 1, @CHANGEAGENTID , @CHANGEAGENTID, GETDATE(), GETDATE() )
--ADD TO EVENT VIEWER --commenting for now. -- SET @EVENTMESSAGE = 'Username: ' + @USERNAME + ' Displayname: ' + @DISPLAYNAME + ' viewed ' + @NAME + ' PID - ' + @PID + ' GP tab. This record is a ' + @PATIENTSECURITY -- EXEC master.dbo.xp_logevent 60000, @EVENTMESSAGE, informational
-- declare @Msg as varchar(100) --set @Msg = 'Your View of MIMED Info Data has been logged! ' /* --Audit code end */
